Name: Flexible Fishing Pole
Description:
Made of more flexible materials, with improved durability.
Equipped with a more flexible fishing line, it can slow down the tension increase of the line while fishing.
The fishing pole has durability, and fishing will consume the rod's durability. Once the durability is exhausted, the rod will be lost.
There is a certain probability of accidental damage while fishing, which will directly result in the loss of the rod.
